content: I feel like we have a fair amount of documentation about libs team process that was setup years ago and isn't really maintained anymore, even though in many cases it's still mostly accurate
I'm wondering if it might be a good idea to do an audit of all libs team related docs to make sure they're all up to date and to deduplicate things as much as possible
the doc on the rfcs repo in particular seems like a duplicate of some of the info we recently added to the libs team charter
yes, that would be nice. if someone has the time
